answers.answer: Do you have any back pain as well?  Does the pain start at your back and go down your leg?Do you have a rash to this leg?  Have you had chickenpox in the past?Do you have a history of diabetes or other medial problems?  What medicines do you take?What are you doing to help with the pain?Have you see a doctor for this problem?  If not, I suggest you do.

question: I am 62.  The outside of my left leg, from the knee to just above the ankle, burns and tingles.  I cant lie on my left side because the pain becomes unbearable where it touches the bed.  Even when nothing is touching it, it tingles and feels numb down to include the top of the foot.
title: burning on the side of one leg
